column4: hello. i have 20 upgradable in adept manager after upgrading from gutsy to hardy and when i do full upgrade it doesnt do anything and "apply changes" remains inactive
0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 20 not upgraded.
: try update-manager from command line, and give me any unusual output
current dist not found in meta-release file
: look online for a /etc/X11/xorg.conf normal file for hardy, and reinstall that. Also check that Hardy Heron was actually installed
what i did was an upgrade from the adept_manager from gutsy to hardy so i am sure hardy is installed
: when you boot up and go into grub does it say 8.04? press system -> about and tell me if it says 8.04, just to check to make sure the install went correctly
: go to this in your firefox. Does it say 8.04? file:///usr/share/ubuntu-artwork/home/index.html
yes. in firefox and in grub too. it says 8.04 in both of them
: ok, what does apt-get upgrade say?
: that is in command line, so it should look like name@host$sudo apt-get upgrade
and it gives me the 20 packages
: how important are these packages? if they are not important, remove then install them.
they are not so important so no problem but that was just strange you know :). thanks
: no problem. Reinstalling in synaptic would do the same thing. It is probobly a unsatisfied dependency.
another question please. after the upgrade to hardy i lost my wireless connectivity. i have a intel 3945abg. no propietary drivers showing although
